item.title: 日本最大电子展失去消费者魅力
item.description: 日本曾经是世界上最大的电子产品品牌的发源地，如今它正在接受自己在技术领域的新角色。但首先...【原文：Japan, home to what once were the world’s biggest electronics brands, is embracing its new sidekick role in technology. But first...】

item.title: 崛起的贷款人被控隐瞒费用，留下诉讼痕迹
item.description: 罗德尼-威廉姆斯（Rodney Williams）和特拉维斯-霍洛威（Travis Holoway）于 2018 年共同创立了点对点借贷平台 SoLo Funds Inc.SoLo Funds 是风险投资领域为数不多的黑人创办的初创公司之一（2023 年，黑人获得的风险投资仅占全部风险投资的 0.48%），其定位是为那些在紧急情况下发现自己资金短缺的人提供贷款解决方案。【原文：Rodney Williams and Travis Holoway co-founded peer-to-peer lending platform SoLo Funds Inc. in 2018 with a commitment to help the millions of Americans targeted by abusive lenders. One of the few Black-founded startups in venture capital – a demographic that secured only 0.48% of all venture dollars in 2023 – SoLo Funds positioned itself to be a lending solution for those who find themselves cash-strapped in emergency situations.】

item.title: ASML 首席执行官表示，迁移是成功的关键，"必须继续"。
item.description: ASML Holding NV 首席执行官克里斯托夫-福凯（Christophe Fouquet）说，荷兰等欧洲国家要想在关键行业保持竞争力，就不能限制入境移民。【原文：ASML Holding NV Chief Executive Officer Christophe Fouquet said European countries like the Netherlands must not restrict inbound migration if they want to remain competitive in key industries.】

item.title: 美国放缓宽松政策，新兴市场债务加入全球大跌行列
item.description: 周二，由于投资者权衡美国降息放缓的前景，推动美国收益率走高，发展中国家债券随股市走软。【原文：Developing-world bonds weakened along with stocks on Tuesday as investors weigh the prospect of slower US interest-rate cuts, pushing US yields higher.】

item.title: 清洁能源需求增长，阿达尼绿色公司利润跃升 38
item.description: 阿达尼绿色能源有限公司（Adani Green Energy Ltd. ）第二季度利润增长 38%，原因是售电量增加和安装量扩大。【原文：Adani Green Energy Ltd. reported a 38% increase in second-quarter profit, following rising power sales and an installation expansion.】

item.title: 面巾纸生产商金佰利克拉克因销售业绩不佳而下调预测
item.description: Scott 卫生纸品牌的所有者金佰利公司（Kimberly-Clark Corp.【原文：Kimberly-Clark Corp., owner of the Scott toilet paper brand, lowered its full-year organic sales forecast after reporting weaker-than-expected results.】

item.title: 债券交易员再次误解美联储
item.description: 美联储不会像预期的那样大幅降息的风险令债券市场感到恐慌。10 年期国债收益率自 7 月份以来首次升至 4.2% 以上，引发了从澳大利亚到德国的借贷成本飙升。衡量债务市场预期波动性的指标，即 Ice BofA MOVE 指数，目前处于年内最高点附近。【原文：Bonds markets are reeling from the risk that the Fed won’t cut interest rates as much as expected. The 10-year Treasury yield rose above 4.2% for the first time since July, setting off a surge in borrowing costs from Australia to Germany. A gauge of expected debt-market volatility, called the Ice BofA MOVE index, is now around its highest of the year.】

item.title: 孟加拉国寻求在 2024 年第五次加息以抑制通货膨胀
item.description: 孟加拉国中央银行今年第五次上调关键政策利率，以降低物价，因为高通胀仍然是穆罕默德-尤努斯领导的临时政府的主要关切。【原文：Bangladesh’s central bank increased the key policy rate for the fifth time this year to cool prices as high inflation remain a key concern for the interim government led by Muhammad Yunus.】

item.title: 南非仍在动用石油储备为燃料补贴提供资金
item.description: 南非仍在出售战略储备石油，为两年前推出的措施提供资金，以缓解公路燃油价格飙升对消费者造成的影响。【原文：South Africa is still selling oil from strategic stockpiles to fund measures introduced two years ago to cushion consumers from a spike in road fuel prices.】

item.title: 西塔拉曼称印度面临的主要挑战是年轻人的技能差距
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）表示，印度在培养庞大的年轻劳动力以满足就业市场需求方面面临巨大挑战。【原文：India’s Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said the nation faces a significant challenge skilling its vast young workforce to meet the requirements of the job market.】

item.title: 阿尔芒说，法国考虑使在线赌场合法化并征税
item.description: 法国正在考虑使网上赌场合法化并对其征税，因为资金短缺的政府正努力减少不断膨胀的赤字并打击非法赌博。【原文：France is considering legalizing online casinos and taxing them as the cash-strapped government seeks to reduce its ballooning deficit and fight illegal gambling.】

item.title: 挪威 1.8 万亿美元基金以 4.4% 的回报率领先基准基金
item.description: 挪威 1.8 万亿美元的主权财富基金第三季度回报率为 4.4%，即 764 亿美元。【原文：Norway’s $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund returned 4.4%, or $76.4 billion, in the third quarter after broad equity gains on declining interest rates.】

item.title: 中国对欧盟电动车出口在征税即将到来之前猛增
item.description: 9 月份，中国向欧盟出口了 6 万多辆电动汽车，在额外关税预计于本月底生效之前，出货量跃升至历史第二高水平。【原文：China exported more than 60,000 electric vehicles to the European Union in September, with shipments jumping to the second-highest level on record ahead of additional tariffs expected to take effect at the end of this month.】

item.title: 德国能源大户越来越多地投资美国
item.description: 据德国联邦银行称，德国制造商正越来越多地将投资方向转向美国，尤其是在那些使用大量能源、因而更容易受到国内成本上升影响的行业。【原文：German manufacturers are increasingly directing investments to the US, especially in sectors that use lots of energy and are thus more exposed to higher costs at home, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 沃尔玛将提供处方药配送服务，挑战亚马逊
item.description: 沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc. ）将开始在短短 30 分钟内将处方药送到美国家庭，此举旨在抢占更大的在线消费份额，并与亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：Walmart Inc. will start delivering prescriptions to US homes in as little as 30 minutes, a move that’s intended to grab a bigger slice of online spending and compete against Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 肖尔茨敦促增加招聘、提高工资以重振德国经济增长
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）敦促德国雇主雇用更多员工并支付更高的工资，以帮助重振经济增长。【原文：Chancellor Olaf Scholz urged Germany’s employers to hire more people and pay higher wages to help revive economic growth.】

item.title: ASML 首席执行官认为美国对中国施加更多限制的压力正在增加
item.description: ASML Holding NV 首席执行官克里斯托夫-福凯（Christophe Fouquet）预计，美国进一步限制向中国销售半导体技术的压力将越来越大，而中国是这家荷兰芯片制造设备生产商的最大市场。【原文：ASML Holding NV Chief Executive Officer Christophe Fouquet expects pressure will grow from the US to further restrict sales of semiconductor technology to China, the biggest market for the Dutch producer of chipmaking machines.】

item.title: 新加坡因潜在威胁封禁 10 个与外国有联系的网站
item.description: 新加坡下令封杀 10 个与外国行为者有关联的假冒网站，这些网站可能被用于针对新加坡的 "敌对信息宣传活动"。【原文：Singapore ordered the blocking of 10 fake websites linked to foreign actors that could be used to “mount hostile information campaigns” against the city-state.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Altana 被指控在交易失败后窃取合作伙伴机密
item.description: 根据英国审判中的指控，一家总部位于伦敦的投资公司指控一家对冲基金滥用商业机密，以建立自己的利润丰厚的基金。【原文：A London-based investment firm accused a hedge fund of misusing trade secrets to set up its own lucrative fund, according to allegations at a UK trial.】

item.title: 印度名人索南-卡普尔以 570 万美元买下孟买标志性音乐商店
item.description: 明星索南-卡普尔及其丈夫阿南德-阿胡贾拥有的 Bhaane 集团正在以 4.784 亿卢比（570 万美元）的价格收购印度金融首都孟买的标志性音乐商店 Rhythm House。【原文：Bhaane Group, owned by celebrity Sonam Kapoor and her husband Anand Ahuja, is buying Rhythm House, an iconic music store in India’s financial capital Mumbai for 478.4 million rupees ($5.7 million).】

item.title: 俄罗斯海运原油量升至 6 月以来最高水平
item.description:
炼油厂的工作将把加工量推至 2022 年以来的最低点

。【原文：

Refinery work is set to push processing to the lowest since 2022

】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克是民主党的新超级反派
item.description:
这位喜欢MAGA的首席执行官现在成了反对特朗普的中心目标。【原文：

The MAGA-friendly CEO is now a central target for the opposition to Trump.

】

item.title: 美国银行准备迎接消费者金融数据共享的新时代
item.description: 在最高消费者监督机构敲定了一项期待已久的旨在促进金融产品竞争的规定之后，美国银行现在必须让客户能够访问他们的财务数据。【原文：US banks will now have to give customers access to their financial data after the top consumer watchdog finalized a long-awaited rule aimed at fueling more competition for financial products.】

item.title: 干燥天气导致俄罗斯小麦产量连续第三年减少
item.description: 由于缺少降雨，世界头号小麦种植国俄罗斯的小麦种植推迟，小麦产量连续第三年缩减。【原文：Russia’s wheat production is seen shrinking for a third year after a lack of rain has delayed plantings in the world’s top grower.】

item.title: 意大利寻求在惠誉评级提升后通过出售债券筹集资金
item.description: 意大利正在通过银行出售 7 年期和 30 年期债券，因为财政部试图利用惠誉评级公司上周上调展望的机会。【原文：Italy is selling seven- and 30-year bonds through banks as the Treasury seeks to capitalize on last week’s outlook upgrade by Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 花旗银行称，S&P 500 指数风险敞口达到下滑 10%之前的水平
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Exposure to the S&P 500 has reached levels that were followed by a 10% slump in the past, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 欧洲股市在全球债券大跌中保持稳定，SAP大放异彩
item.description: 周二，欧洲股市横盘整理，上午财报繁忙，美国联邦储备委员会降息预期降温引发全球债券大跌。【原文：European stocks traded sideways Tuesday amid a busy morning for earnings and a global bond selloff triggered by cooling expectations of US Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: ASML、Arm 和 Prosus 首席执行官将在彭博技术峰会上发言
item.description: Christophe Fouquet 摄影师Peter Boer/Bloomberg【原文：Christophe Fouquet Photographer: Peter Boer/Bloomberg】

item.title: 安联考虑终止数十年之久的 Bajaj 保险公司在印度的合资企业
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安联集团（Allianz SE）正在与 Bajaj Finserv Ltd.商谈取消在印度的两家合资企业，双方在合作方向上存在争议。【原文：Allianz SE is in talks to scrap two Indian joint ventures with Bajaj Finserv Ltd., in a dispute over the direction of the partnership, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 商业部长称英伟达计划投资泰国
item.description: 随着东南亚成为建设人工智能数据中心和制造相关组件的热点地区，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp. is set to unveil investment plans for Thailand, joining Alphabet Inc. and Microsoft Corp., as Southeast Asia becomes a hot spot for building AI data centers and manufacturing the components that power them.】
